member.name: T:RenrenCore.Common.LayoutAwarePage
member.summary:
Typical implementation of Page that provides several important conveniences:
Application view state to visual state mapping
GoBack, GoForward, and GoHome event handlers
Mouse and keyboard shortcuts for navigation
State management for navigation and process lifetime management
A default view model

member.name: M:RenrenCore.Common.LayoutAwarePage.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:RenrenCore.Common.LayoutAwarePage.GoHome(System.Object,Windows.UI.Xaml.RoutedEventArgs)
member.summary: Invoked as an event handler to navigate backward in the page's associated until it reaches the top of the navigation stack.
member.param: Event data describing the conditions that led to the event.

member.name: M:RenrenCore.Common.LayoutAwarePage.GoBack(System.Object,Windows.UI.Xaml.RoutedEventArgs)
member.summary: Invoked as an event handler to navigate backward in the navigation stack associated with this page's .
member.param: Event data describing the conditions that led to the event.

member.name: M:RenrenCore.Common.LayoutAwarePage.GoForward(System.Object,Windows.UI.Xaml.RoutedEventArgs)
member.summary: Invoked as an event handler to navigate forward in the navigation stack associated with this page's .
member.param: Event data describing the conditions that led to the event.

member.name: M:RenrenCore.Common.LayoutAwarePage.CoreDispatcher_AcceleratorKeyActivated(Windows.UI.Core.CoreDispatcher,Windows.UI.Core.AcceleratorKeyEventArgs)
member.summary: Invoked on every keystroke, including system keys such as Alt key combinations, when this page is active and occupies the entire window. Used to detect keyboard navigation between pages even when the page itself doesn't have focus.
member.param: Event data describing the conditions that led to the event.

member.name: M:RenrenCore.Common.LayoutAwarePage.CoreWindow_PointerPressed(Windows.UI.Core.CoreWindow,Windows.UI.Core.PointerEventArgs)
member.summary: Invoked on every mouse click, touch screen tap, or equivalent interaction when this page is active and occupies the entire window. Used to detect browser-style next and previous mouse button clicks to navigate between pages.
member.param: Event data describing the conditions that led to the event.

member.name: M:RenrenCore.Common.LayoutAwarePage.StartLayoutUpdates(System.Object,Windows.UI.Xaml.RoutedEventArgs)
member.summary: Invoked as an event handler, typically on the event of a within the page, to indicate that the sender should start receiving visual state management changes that correspond to application view state changes.
member.param: Instance of that supports visual state management corresponding to view states.
Event data that describes how the request was made.
member.remarks: The current view state will immediately be used to set the corresponding visual state when layout updates are requested. A corresponding event handler connected to is strongly encouraged. Instances of automatically invoke these handlers in their Loaded and Unloaded events.

member.name: M:RenrenCore.Common.LayoutAwarePage.StopLayoutUpdates(System.Object,Windows.UI.Xaml.RoutedEventArgs)
member.summary: Invoked as an event handler, typically on the event of a , to indicate that the sender should start receiving visual state management changes that correspond to application view state changes.
member.param: Instance of that supports visual state management corresponding to view states.
Event data that describes how the request was made.
member.remarks: The current view state will immediately be used to set the corresponding visual state when layout updates are requested.

member.name: M:RenrenCore.Common.LayoutAwarePage.DetermineVisualState(Windows.UI.ViewManagement.ApplicationViewState)
member.summary: Translates values into strings for visual state management within the page. The default implementation uses the names of enum values. Subclasses may override this method to control the mapping scheme used.
member.param: View state for which a visual state is desired.
member.returns: Visual state name used to drive the

member.name: M:RenrenCore.Common.LayoutAwarePage.InvalidateVisualState
member.summary: Updates all controls that are listening for visual state changes with the correct visual state.
member.remarks: Typically used in conjunction with overriding to signal that a different value may be returned even though the view state has not changed.

member.name: M:RenrenCore.Common.LayoutAwarePage.OnNavigatedTo(Windows.UI.Xaml.Navigation.NavigationEventArgs)
member.summary: Invoked when this page is about to be displayed in a Frame.
member.param: Event data that describes how this page was reached. The Parameter property provides the group to be displayed.

member.name: M:RenrenCore.Common.LayoutAwarePage.OnNavigatedFrom(Windows.UI.Xaml.Navigation.NavigationEventArgs)
member.summary: Invoked when this page will no longer be displayed in a Frame.
member.param: Event data that describes how this page was reached. The Parameter property provides the group to be displayed.

member.name: M:RenrenCore.Common.LayoutAwarePage.LoadState(System.Object,System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.Object})
member.summary: Populates the page with content passed during navigation. Any saved state is also provided when recreating a page from a prior session.
member.param: The parameter value passed to when this page was initially requested.
A dictionary of state preserved by this page during an earlier session. This will be null the first time a page is visited.

member.name: M:RenrenCore.Common.LayoutAwarePage.SaveState(System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.Object})
member.summary: Preserves state associated with this page in case the application is suspended or the page is discarded from the navigation cache. Values must conform to the serialization requirements of .
member.param: An empty dictionary to be populated with serializable state.

member.summary: An implementation of designed to be used as a trivial view model.

member.name: T:RenrenCore.Common.LayoutAwarePage.ObservableDictionary`2
member.summary: Implementation of IObservableMap that supports reentrancy for use as a default view model.

member.name: T:RenrenCore.Common.RichTextColumns
member.summary: Wrapper for that creates as many additional overflow columns as needed to fit the available content.
member.example: The following creates a collection of 400-pixel wide columns spaced 50 pixels apart to contain arbitrary data-bound content:
member.remarks: Typically used in a horizontally scrolling region where an unbounded amount of space allows for all needed columns to be created. When used in a vertically scrolling space there will never be any additional columns.

member.name: M:RenrenCore.Common.RichTextColumns.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:RenrenCore.Common.RichTextColumns.ResetOverflowLayout(Windows.UI.Xaml.DependencyObject,Windows.UI.Xaml.DependencyPropertyChangedEventArgs)
member.summary: Invoked when the content or overflow template is changed to recreate the column layout.
member.param: Instance of where the change occurred.
Event data describing the specific change.

member.name: F:RenrenCore.Common.RichTextColumns._overflowColumns
member.summary: Lists overflow columns already created. Must maintain a 1:1 relationship with instances in the collection following the initial RichTextBlock child.

member.name: M:RenrenCore.Common.RichTextColumns.MeasureOverride(Windows.Foundation.Size)
member.summary: Determines whether additional overflow columns are needed and if existing columns can be removed.
member.param: The size of the space available, used to constrain the number of additional columns that can be created.
member.returns: The resulting size of the original content plus any extra columns.

member.name: M:RenrenCore.Common.RichTextColumns.ArrangeOverride(Windows.Foundation.Size)
member.summary: Arranges the original content and all extra columns.
member.param: Defines the size of the area the children must be arranged within.
member.returns: The size of the area the children actually required.

member.name: P:RenrenCore.Common.RichTextColumns.RichTextContent
member.summary: Gets or sets the initial rich text content to be used as the first column.

member.name: P:RenrenCore.Common.RichTextColumns.ColumnTemplate
member.summary: Gets or sets the template used to create additional instances.

member.name: T:RenrenCore.Common.SuspensionManager
member.summary: SuspensionManager captures global session state to simplify process lifetime management for an application. Note that session state will be automatically cleared under a variety of conditions and should only be used to store information that would be convenient to carry across sessions, but that should be disacarded when an application crashes or is upgraded.

member.name: M:RenrenCore.Common.SuspensionManager.SaveAsync
member.summary: Save the current . Any instances registered with will also preserve their current navigation stack, which in turn gives their active an opportunity to save its state.
member.returns: An asynchronous task that reflects when session state has been saved.

member.name: M:RenrenCore.Common.SuspensionManager.RestoreAsync
member.summary: Restores previously saved . Any instances registered with will also restore their prior navigation state, which in turn gives their active an opportunity restore its state.
member.returns: An asynchronous task that reflects when session state has been read. The content of should not be relied upon until this task completes.

member.name: M:RenrenCore.Common.SuspensionManager.RegisterFrame(Windows.UI.Xaml.Controls.Frame,System.String)
member.summary: Registers a instance to allow its navigation history to be saved to and restored from . Frames should be registered once immediately after creation if they will participate in session state management. Upon registration if state has already been restored for the specified key the navigation history will immediately be restored. Subsequent invocations of will also restore navigation history.
member.param: An instance whose navigation history should be managed by
A unique key into used to store navigation-related information.

member.name: M:RenrenCore.Common.SuspensionManager.UnregisterFrame(Windows.UI.Xaml.Controls.Frame)
member.summary: Disassociates a previously registered by from . Any navigation state previously captured will be removed.
member.param: An instance whose navigation history should no longer be managed.

member.name: M:RenrenCore.Common.SuspensionManager.SessionStateForFrame(Windows.UI.Xaml.Controls.Frame)
member.summary: Provides storage for session state associated with the specified . Frames that have been previously registered with have their session state saved and restored automatically as a part of the global . Frames that are not registered have transient state that can still be useful when restoring pages that have been discarded from the navigation cache.
member.remarks: Apps may choose to rely on to manage page-specific state instead of working with frame session state directly.
member.param: The instance for which session state is desired.
member.returns: A collection of state subject to the same serialization mechanism as .

member.name: P:RenrenCore.Common.SuspensionManager.SessionState
member.summary: Provides access to global session state for the current session. This state is serialized by and restored by , so values must be serializable by and should be as compact as possible. Strings and other self-contained data types are strongly recommended.

member.name: P:RenrenCore.Common.SuspensionManager.KnownTypes
member.summary: List of custom types provided to the when reading and writing session state. Initially empty, additional types may be added to customize the serialization process.

member.name: T:RenrenCore.RRServices.RRServiceBase`2
member.summary: Generic Renren Service Base class based on id In charge of containing the common data using flyweighter and interfaces of all view model. We can put some generic interface or common data here, Since the renren serice apis have lots of different inputs, so in the init version, we just put the common data and some request interfaces in the base class, and later on, we can abstract the more common interface in it. \note: id in this class means some kind of key linked to data model, for example: in feedlist view model id means user id; in nearby place view model id means the poi id

member.name: M:RenrenCore.RRServices.RRServiceBase`2.Request(System.Object[])
member.summary: Self request and update \note: this is a async await interface

member.summary: Request and update by id \note: this is a async await interface

member.name: M:RenrenCore.RRServices.NearbyActivityListService.RequestNearbyActivityListByLatlon(System.Int64,System.Int64,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: 返回某个经纬度周边的活动poi列表; 如果该地点有一个活动，则返回该活动URL地址；如果该地点有多个活动，则返回地点map，活动列表URL
member.param: 判断附近的半径，单位为公里
是否不返回活动列表数据
传的经纬度是否需要偏转
活动的类型：event_type=1优惠券；event_type=2团购；event_type=3活动；event_type=4 全部
地点分类。包括美食、娱乐、生活、购物、运动、酒店、其他，取全部分类时传空即可
